attributes.action: Bring infrastructure back in to a very deprived  community
attributes.additional_details: Because we are a lost voice. We are desperate for help and no one is listing. We have 3 shops, one is  a chemist, a betting shop,and a paper shop. And around 20 un used shop units that's been closed for the past 10 years to my knowledge. Please help us
attributes.background: Help us to revive all the existing ran down commercial premises so people that can't travel out to are have a much easier option

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
